msg: Fix problem with empty Content-Encoding headers introduced by last patch.

msg: Improve the error_log message for "lost connection" so that

author: fielding
msg: Reverse last change.  Vetoed because they are warnings and because
APLOG_NOTICE is always logged regardless of log level.
